content.question: The author uses the "not only" construction in Paragraph 1 to

choices.label: convey a heightened degree of involvement in shared literary activities during a period
recommend ways of giving literary activities a broader cultural significance
suggest that literary activities were best reserved for group settings
argue that literary activities should reflect common values rather than personal ones

content.answer: convey a heightened degree of involvement in shared literary activities during a period

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how writers create, combine, and place independent and dependent clauses to show relationships between and among ideas.
